algorithm_technique: Iteratively take nodes from the unsorted part and insert them into their correct sorted position in a new sorted list.
problem_summary_simple: Sort a linked list using the insertion sort algorithm.
problem_summary_technical: Implement insertion sort for a linked list by building a sorted list and inserting each node from the original list.
key_insights: Insertion sort on a linked list typically involves creating a new sorted list and inserting nodes one by one.
A dummy node at the beginning of the sorted list simplifies the insertion process, especially for inserting at the head.
The algorithm requires careful pointer manipulation to detach a node from the original list and insert it into the sorted list.
